text:
We’d like to get the label of a choice field option. However to our understanding it’s not possible?

Scenario:

A sorter + a list of products.

On a product the editor can select multiple use cases via the choice field (fx. “House & Villas”, “Cardealer”, “Appartments” etc.). This would be the labels and the values would be “villas”, “cardealer” and “appartments”.

The thought was then to populate the sorter with the choice field labels added on a product and then some JS to create a hide/show function per use case.

We could set the value equal to the label, however the language is not english and choices can contain spaces and ampersands etc.

It seems this exact issue was requested back in 2019, but it seems that in 3 years nothing has happened regarding choice labels: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Choice-Field-Value-vs-Label/td-p/451572>
Hello Folks any idea how can we add Pagination on the Deal lists on table using Hubl module.
And then access those params using `request.query_dict.paramname`
wherer paramname is the name of the parameter

Hi! is it ok to set a Global variable on a base.html , then I am updating it's content inside a partial template, being accessed by modules.

```Inside my base.html
{%- set morning_seed_post_global = [] -%}

Then inside a parial template:
{%- do morning_seed_post_global.append(dataSet) -%}```
It's currently working, but want to know if this is a normal practice in hubl.
